question: List as many studies are you can that include rapamycin
statements: Mannick et al. (2014) conducted a study assessing the impact of a rapamycin derivative on healthy aging in people.
Paoloni et al. (2010) conducted a veterinary clinical trial testing rapamycin as a treatment for osteosarcoma.

Kaeberlein (2015) conducted a veterinary clinical trial assessing the side effect profile and effects on age-associated cardiac function following 10 weeks of rapamycin treatment in healthy elderly dogs.
Larson et al. (2016) conducted a study on the pharmacokinetic analysis of rapamycin treatment in healthy dogs.
Johnson et al. (2015) conducted a study on the effects of rapamycin in aging mice.
Johnson et al. (2013) conducted a study on the effects of rapamycin in rodents.
A study was conducted on the effects of rapamycin on the replicative life of yeast.
A study was conducted on the effects of rapamycin in 20-month-old mice.
A study was conducted on the combination of rapamycin with other compounds for anti-aging activity.
